name: Ankit Kumar Singh
about: I'm a MCA student at Department of Computer Science(School of Engineering & Technology), Pondicherry University, Puducherry. My program is focused on application aspects of Computer Science which includes programming, data structures, computer architecture, algorithm design & analysis, operating systems, object oriented programming, software engineering. Along with these i studied here about web technology,cloud computing, networking and artificial intelligence. Personally i'm so much interested in Android development, algorithms & data structure, c++ & java programming. apart from above I like Cricket and music.
